dataset_id: BOREAS TF-02 SSA-OA Tower Flux, Meteorological, and Precipitation Data
title: BOREAS TF-02 SSA-OA Tower Flux, Meteorological, and Precipitation Data
summary: Energy, carbon dioxide, water vaport, and momentum flux data collected above the canopy and in profiles through the canopy, along with meteorological data at the BOREAS SSA-OA site. Daily precipitation data from several gauges were also collected.
